resources.string: Enter the name of the song
You have to enter the artist!
The first character must not be a space or dot.
This tablature already exists on your favorites
Are you sure you want to delete this item?
Perhaps the SD card is not mounted?
Unable to write to external storage.
This tablature was added to favorites, but its title or artist was edited. Do you still want to add it to favorites?
Add a song title for this performer
You have to choose or type in performer to continue
You have to choose or type in title to continue
Unknown input/output error on SDCard while writing to config file
Error while trying to task sleep
Thanks for downloading this app. Click Help to view summary of this program\'s functions.
There are no tablatures in favorites
Press magnifier icon with empty textbox to find this performer\'s all available songs
The list of recently shown tablatures is empty
Screenshots below present TabHero on Android Ice Cream Sandwich version. On Android Ginger Bread version and older, most of these options are available pressing menu button.
Menu button which shows short information and from which help can be displayed.
Menu button toggles status bar. Not available for tablet devices.
Instead of pressing buttons (3) and (4), you can go to the those sections by swiping screen to left or right.

Menu button which shows last ten viewed tablatures.
 - The list consists of the name of the performer, the song title and one of the two icons:
 * planet means, the tablature was shown via Internet;
 * star means, the tablature was shown in Favorites.
 - The tablature appear when you select one of the items from the list. You don't need an Internet connection.
Pressing this button turns WiFi off. Shown when WiFi is on.
Shown when mobile data transfer is on.\n - If you can\'t see this button, it means mobile data is off or wifi is enabled (2).\n - Pressing button turns off mobile data.
Pressing this button turns WiFi on. Shown when WiFi is off.\n - In addition, if mobile data is on (3), then you can press this button to turn off mobile data transfer.
Search for performers or songs on any search screen.\n - Search for input string in available names of performers/songs.

Type performer or song name here.\n - If you don\'t type in any character and start searching, you\'ll get all the possibilities.*\n * Internet performer search is an exception. First typed character is a first letter of searched performer.
List of performers/songs found. Select one to see details.
You can go back to previous screen by pressing \"back\" button on your device or swiping back the screen.
Add displayed tablature to favorites.\n - If this tablature already exists in favorites or the name of this performer/song in favorites has changed, an appropriate message will be displayed.
Search for lyrics of this song in web browser.
Remove currently displayed tablature from favorites.

Save currently displayed tablature as file on internal memory. It allows to edit this tablature.
 - After editing previously saved tablature, your tablature in favorites is replaced with a new one (with your changes) and the file is automatically deleted from memory.
 - Path: /sdcard/Android/pl.tabhero/performer_name-song_name.tablature_id.txt
 - To update tablature from file make sure not to change the name of this file.
Static bar with the performer and the song names.\n - If you touch this bar, at the bottom of the screen plus and minus buttons (6) will appear.
Slightly scales tablature font down or up.
Current tablature.\n - You can scale tablature size up or down by pinch gesture.\n - Long press to show orientation lock/unlock button (8).
Press to lock or unlock orientation of the screen.
Auto-sleep is disabled on tablature screen.
Add your own performer/song to favorites.
Choose one of performers or songs to view details.\n - On long touch on one of these items you can change name of this performer/song.
You can go back to previous screen by pressing \"back\" button on your device or swiping back the screen.
Invert selection, e.g.: all selected options will be cleared, all unselected will be selected.
Remove all selected performers (and all their songs) or all selected songs.
Having problems with TabHero? Questions, suggestions? Please mail me. Job offers will be also acceptable :)
Button to lock orientation of the screen
Button to unlock orientation of the screen
Button to scale down font size of the tablature
Button to scale up font size of the tablature
